snippet.title: Tiny Heroes - Now Available!
snippet.description:
The Tiny Heroes are on a rampage!  Only you (and, well anyone who wants to) can stop them!

Tiny Heroes (released September 2011) is a tower defense game for the iPhone, by award-winning game developer David Whatley, creator of Game of the Year geoDefense!

http://tinyheroes.com
